title: Have $1k to blow...What have you got??
author: WhiteBorderObsession

posts.post_title: Have $1k to blow...What have you got??
posts.post_content:
***SOLD***
I’m looking to spend up to $1k on a PSA/SGC 4 or higher, T206 HOFer. I’m willing to pay full market value (VCP, if enough sales to support). I’ll pay PP G&S. I’m open to any HOFer, but I’m hoping for:

Lajoie Portrait
Keeler Portrait
Mathewson Portrait
Eddie Collins Portrait

Polar Bear backs are a PLUS!!

Please email any pics and prices to: [url]gijoemonterey@yahoo.com[/url]
